sn35.145:3.1: 145. Bāhirānattahetusutta
sn35.145:4.2: Yopi hetu, yopi paccayo rūpānaṃ uppādāya, sopi anattā.
sn35.145:4.3: Anattasambhūtā, bhikkhave, rūpā kuto attā bhavissanti.
sn35.145:4.9: Yopi hetu, yopi paccayo dhammānaṃ uppādāya, sopi anattā.
sn35.145:4.10: Anattasambhūtā, bhikkhave, dhammā kuto attā bhavissanti.
sn35.145:4.11: Evaṃ passaṃ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako rūpesupi nibbindati, saddesupi …
sn35.145:4.19: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā’ti pajānātī”ti.
